hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -x
export
BOOT_LOC=/targetNFS/ubuntu_for_deployment/sys_setup/bin
function generate_jobs() { test_name=$1 distro=$2 for PLAT in $SHELL_PLATFORM do board_arch=${dict[$PLAT]} if [ x"$distro" != x"" ]; then python lava-kernel-ci-job-creator.py $FTP_SERVER/${TREE_NAME}/${GIT_DESCRIBE}/${PLAT}-${board_arch}/ --plans $test_name --distro $distro else python lava-kernel-ci-job-creator.py $FTP_SERVER/${TREE_NAME}/${GIT_DESCRIBE}/${PLAT}-${board_arch}/ --plans $test_name fi if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "create the boot jobs error! Aborting" exit -1 fi done }
function run_and_report_jobs() { cd jobs python ../lava-job-runner.py --username $LAVA_USER --token $LAVA_TOKEN --server $LAVA_SERVER --stream $LAVA_STREAM --poll POLL cd .. if [ ! -f jobs/results/POLL ]; then echo "Running the boot jobs error! Aborting" exit -1 fi python lava-report.py --boot jobs/results/POLL --lab $LAVA_USER --api $KERNELCI_SERVER --token $KERNELCI_TOKEN
if [ ! -d results ]; then echo "running the boot jobs error! Aborting" exit -1 fi }
function judge_pass_or_not() { FAIL_FLAG=$(grep -R 'FAIL' ./jobs/results/POLL) if [ "$FAIL_FLAG"x != ""x ]; then echo "boot job fail" exit -1 fi
PASS_FLAG=$(grep -R 'PASS' ./jobs/results/POLL) if [ "$PASS_FLAG"x = ""x ]; then echo "boot job fail" exit -1 fi }
function run_and_move_result() { run_and_report_jobs [ $? -ne 0 ] && exit -1 judge_pass_or_not [ $? -ne 0 ] && exit -1 test -d results && mv results results_$1 test -d jobs && mv jobs jobs_$1 [ ! -d $2 ]&& mkdir -p $2 test -d jobs_$1 && mv jobs_$1 $2 test -d results_$1 && mv results_$1 $2 }
####### Begining the tests ###### current_path=$(pwd) set +x DEVCCE_IP='device_ip_type.txt'
cd local/lava-ci/boot-app-scripts rm -fr jobs
test -d $GIT_DESCRIBE && rm -fr $GIT_DESCRIBE
read -a arch <<< $(echo $ARCH_MAP) declare -A dict for((i=0; i<${#arch[@]}; i++)) do if ((i%2==0)); then j=`expr $i+1` dict[${arch[$i]}]=${arch[$j]} fi done
SHELL_PLATFORM="$(echo $SHELL_PLATFORM | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')"
##### copy some files to the lava-server machine to support the boot process ##### set -x set -e echo $TFTP_DIR scp download_all_file.py download_distros.sh $USER@$HOST:$TFTP_DIR ssh $USER@$HOST "cd $TFTP_DIR; test -d download && rm -fr download; mkdir download;" ssh $USER@$HOST "cd $TFTP_DIR/download; python ../download_all_file.py -u $FTP_SERVER -t $KERNELCI_TOKEN -d $GIT_DESCRIBE -j $TREE_NAME;" ssh $USER@$HOST "cd $TFTP_DIR/download; cp -rf *dtb sata_image ~/; rm -fr download_all_file.py; " ssh jenkins@$HOST "cd $TFTP_DIR/download; sudo cp -f *.dtb *Image* $BOOT_LOC;" for DISTRO in $SHELL_DISTRO; do for PLAT in $SHELL_PLATFORM; do board_arch=${dict[$PLAT]} URL_NAME=$FTP_SERVER/${TREE_NAME}/${GIT_DESCRIBE}/${PLAT}-${board_arch} ssh jenkins@$HOST "cd $TFTP_DIR; sudo ./download_distros.sh $DISTRO $URL_NAME ${board_arch} $PLAT" done done set +e ##### Finish copying files to the lava-server machine #####
[ -d $GIT_DESCRIBE/results ]&& rm -fr $GIT_DESCRIBE/results mkdir -p $GIT_DESCRIBE/results
rm -fr jobs* rm -fr results*
for DISTRO in $SHELL_DISTRO; do [ -d $DISTRO ] && rm -fr $DISTRO mkdir $DISTRO # generate the boot jobs for all the targets if [ '$BOOT_PLAN'x != ''x ]; then generate_jobs $BOOT_PLAN $DISTRO [ $? -ne 0 ] && exit -1 # create the boot jobs for each target and run all these jobs cd jobs python ../create_boot_job.py --username $LAVA_USER --token $LAVA_TOKEN --server $LAVA_SERVER --stream $LAVA_STREAM if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "generate the jobs according the board devices error! Aborting" exit -1 fi cd .. if [ -d jobs ]; then run_and_move_result $BOOT_PLAN $DISTRO fi fi
######################################### ##### Entering the sata disk rootfs ##### BOOT_FOR_TEST=BOOT_SATA # generate the boot jobs for all the target generate_jobs $BOOT_FOR_TEST [ $? -ne 0 ] && exit -1 if [ -d jobs ]; then run_and_move_result $BOOT_FOR_TEST $DISTRO fi ##### End of entering the sata disk ##### #########################################
##### modify the ip address according to the boot information ssh $HOST -l $USER "cd /etc/lava-dispatcher/devices; rm -fr $DEVCCE_IP" scp $DISTRO/results_${BOOT_FOR_TEST}/${LAVA_USER}/${DEVCCE_IP} $USER@$HOST:/etc/lava-dispatcher/devices scp modify_conf_file.sh $USER@$HOST:/etc/lava-dispatcher/devices ssh $HOST -l $USER "cd /etc/lava-dispatcher/devices; ./modify_conf_file.sh"
# generate the application jobs for the board_types for app_plan in $APP_PLAN do [[ $app_plan =~ "BOOT" ]] && continue generate_jobs $app_plan done if [ -d jobs ]; then run_and_move_result app $DISTRO [ $? -ne 0 ] && exit -1 fi python parser.py $DISTRO mv $DISTRO $GIT_DESCRIBE/results done ################################## DES_TMP=boot_results [ -d $DES_TMP ] && rm -fr $DES_TMP mkdir $DES_TMP # generate the application jobs for the board_types for app_plan in $APP_PLAN do [[ $app_plan =~ "BOOT" ]] && generate_jobs $app_plan done if [ -d jobs ]; then run_and_report_jobs [ $? -ne 0 ] && exit -1 test -d jobs && mv jobs $DES_TMP test -d results && mv results $DES_TMP python parser.py $DES_TMP mv $DES_TMP $GIT_DESCRIBE/results fi ##################################
# push the binary files to the ftpserver #sudo python publish.py -j $TREE_NAME -d ./$GIT_DESCRIBE DES_DIR=$FTP_DIR/$TREE_NAME/$GIT_DESCRIBE/ [ ! -d $DES_DIR ] && echo "Don't have the images and dtbs" && exit -1 sudo cp -rf $GIT_DESCRIBE/* $DES_DIR [ $? -ne 0 ]&& exit -1
cd $current_path
